meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of music.
meanings.sent1: The concert featured beautiful musicales performances.
meanings.sent2: She had a deep appreciation for all things musicales.
meanings.sent3: The melodious birds outside seemed to be having their own musicales party.
meanings.sent4: His movements on the dance floor were as fluid and harmonious as a musicales composition.
meanings.sent5: The soothing sound of the flowing river was like a gentle musicales lullaby.

meanings.sent1: We decided to attend the musicales at the local theater.
meanings.sent2: The school put on a fantastic musicales for the community.
meanings.sent3: The circus performers put on a musicales that had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were alive with the vibrant energy of the musicales.
meanings.sent5: The children's faces lit up with joy as they watched the colorful musicales.
